snippet.title: Abandon Ship  Mobile Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Together with our partners at PID Games, we're happy to announce that Abandon Ship is available to pre-order on the Apple Store and Google Play Store:

https://apps.apple.com/us/app/abandon-ship/id1524047277
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pid.abandonship

Take command of an 'Age of Sail' ship and her crew, exploring a vast, story-filled world that reacts to your decisions. Engage enemy vessels, fortifications and sea monsters in brutal tactical combat, all framed in an art style inspired by classic Naval Oil Paintings.
